meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fetid.
meanings.sent1: The fetidity of the garbage left a strong smell in the room.
meanings.sent2: The fetidity of the old socks made everyone hold their noses.
meanings.sent3: The fetidity of the gym socks was so bad, they started walking on their own!
meanings.sent4: The fetidity of the swamp was a thick cloud that hung in the air.
meanings.sent5: The fetidity of the rotten eggs was unbearable, like a cloud of stench.

meanings.sent1: The fetidity in the room was overwhelming, making it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent2: The fetidity of the garbage dump could be smelled from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The fetidity of the cheese was so strong, it could wake the neighbors!
meanings.sent4: The fetidity of failure hung in the air, a constant reminder of defeat.
meanings.sent5: The fetidity of the fish market assaulted their senses, leaving a lasting impression.
